attributes.action: nationalise car insurance as it is a legal requirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should Insurance companies make so much money from car insurance when a driver has to have it to legally drive on the roads? Surely a system whereby every motorist paid their premiums to a central government pot, took their claims from that same pot, but the government then kept the excess to spend on roads and/or public transport would make more sense?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
